name: Amazing Pong!
description:
Amazing Pong is a co-op remake of the old arcade game Pong.

the game include 3 powerup that make the game challenging and fun

the ball also get faster every 15 seconds making it hard to block it while also the players rods will get closer to the center of the game decreasing your time to react to the ball

the game is only in co-op mod, but i am planning on adding a AI to play against

Controls

W & S : for the Left Rod.

Up Arrow & Down Arrow : for the Right Rod
